Package BESA.Kernel.System

Class AdmBESA

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.System.AdmBESA
public abstract class AdmBESA extends Object
This class represents a BESA local administrator.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:
SIDRe - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Takina - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana
